title: PREFACE

book.title: The Story of the British Army
book.description: 简介： I have endeavoured in the space at my disposal to show how the British Army has grown up. I have tried merely to tell a story, and therefore omitted much that might have been said regarding the noble work the Queens Army has done. As regards the opin...
